summary: simple child overhaul. still a wip, so don't expect anything amazing lol
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][size=2]-[/size]
[b]what is this[/b]
a simple child replacement mod i mashed together using assets from others authors (thank you so much!!).
-
[size=4][b]information
[/b][/size]as said above, this literally just changes how they look. i've used other child replacement mods and they were like.. ALMOST THERE.. so i made my own because i'm tiRED OF ALL YOU FRICKS
-
[b][size=4]warning
[/size][/b]this mod does NOT contain any adult content. even if stripped in-game or going through textures, they do NOT have anything sexual. i made sure to tweak the textures so they are free of adult content. please do not submit screenshots depicting them in adult situations or revealing armor/clothing. thank you!
-
[b]requirements[/b]
[size=2]skyrim.esm, update.esm, dawnguard.esm, hearthfires.esm, dragonborn.esm[/size]
-
